issue.title: [CF 310] Reset Icon does not work
issue.body:
version : 4.6.2

When the reset button show "Confirm Reset" and I click again the reset button, it does not happen anything, but it will warn you "Reset timer expired" 5 seconds later.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #310 | Raw

comments.body:
So much for me actually testing things before I release them.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Before i post this ticket, my TMW version is 46210, but TMW 4.6.2 version is 46211.
I use 46211 test once again,it have this bug too.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Another bug: if you close the icon editor in that 5 seconds, the status of reset button will keep to next time you open the icon editor.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

All fixed in r268.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl
